name: The Colorful Square
description:
This game was made for the Pre-Indie Game Jam on itch.io. The theme was Colors. This game fits the theme as colors are seen as a main mechanic in the game.

This game features a short, but entertaining, gameplay experience. In this game, the player has 4 levels to play. To beat each level, the player must reach a door. However, hazards exist in each level. If the player touches a colored platform that does not match the player's color, the player will die. In order to complete each level, the player must take advantage of the mechanic to switch the player's color and they must be careful when the colored platforms randomly switch to a color in a random amount of time.

Features:

* 4 interesting and carefully designed levels.

* Amazing gameplay mechanics.

* Excellent and intuitive UI.

* Great sound effects.
